Package nl.uva.np.luaspot

Class Summary
ApplicationRegistry This class hold the application codes and takes care about application installation and removal to/from the memory.
Applications This class contains several binary codes of pre-installed applications.
LuaSpot The startApp method of this class is called by the VM to start the application.
LuaSpotLib Lua SPOT API for Lua script.
LuaStdLib This class contains the Lua standard library functions.
ManagerService The application manager service that handle application installation and removal.
Semaphore A simple semaphore object that can be used to guard a critical section from execution of multiple threads at the same time.
ServiceProvider The service provider that stands in the front of packet processing.
SunSpotLib Sun SPOT API for Lua script.
Util A class that hold utility functions.
